Dear @fatimahchareonsiri1040,  We're thrilled to receive your Super Thanks, especially because it's the first one for IGCSE Study Buddy! Your contribution, regardless of its size, means a lot to us!  Your support motivates us to keep making education fun and accessible. We really appreciate you helping us reach this special achievement.  Thanks a bunch,  IGCSE Study Buddy Team
Thank you for your support! Wish you all the very best!
